Question: In the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' released in 2011, which two songs feature lyrics written by Swanand Kirkire and Anvita Dutt Guptan?
Options:
A. Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap and Haan Karti
B. Haal-E-Dil and Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
C. Haal-E-Dil and Aaj Ki Raat
D. Chura Liya Hai Tumne and Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
Answer: Haal-E-Dil and Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
